sub_fields.label: Link Target
sub_fields.name: menu_item_link_target
sub_fields.instructions: Choose whether the link should open in a new tab or reload the tab.

fields.label: Link Target
fields.name: link_target
fields.instructions: Choose whether the link should open in a new tab or reload the tab.

fields.label: Carousel
fields.name: carousel
fields.instructions: Add 1 to 6 features to promote various pages and posts.

title: Landing Announcements
description: This page has no editable fields.

fields.label: Hero Image
fields.name: hero_image
fields.instructions: The subject should be on the right side of the image. The left side should have mostly empty space with little to no contrasting detail so that it does not conflict with the white text overlay.

fields.label: Main Color
fields.name: main_color
fields.instructions: This should match the dominant color on the left side of the hero image. It is used on the mobile layout behind the intro text.

fields.label: Intro Text
fields.name: intro_text
fields.instructions: Introduce the section in one to two short sentences.

title: Landing News
description: This page has no editable fields.

fields.label: Presentation Title
fields.name: presentation_title
fields.instructions: A heading for the event. (i.e. "58th Annual Presentation")

fields.label: Presentation Details
fields.name: presentation_details
fields.instructions: Date and location of the event. (i.e. "October 27-28 at Penn State University")

fields.label: Features
fields.name: features
fields.instructions: Add features in even numbers only, so that there are 2 per row.

fields.label: Brief Bio
fields.name: short_bio
fields.instructions: This brief bio appears on the list page and should be about 2 sentences long with no line breaks.

fields.label: Author or Date
fields.name: author
fields.instructions: Use this optional field for either the author's name OR a date, depending on the article type.

fields.label: Introduction
fields.name: introduction
fields.instructions: A single paragraph of text with no line breaks.

sub_fields.label: Detail
sub_fields.name: detail
sub_fields.instructions: Add a detail, such as a date or a deadline.

fields.label: Landing Features
fields.name: landing_features
fields.instructions: Feature pages within this section of the site. There should always be an even number of items so there are 2 per row.

sub_fields.label: Title
sub_fields.name: title
sub_fields.instructions: A short one or two word title.

sub_fields.label: Thumbnail
sub_fields.name: thumbnail
sub_fields.instructions: This thumbnail will be round. The subject should be in the center of the image since the corners will be cropped.

sub_fields.label: Summary
sub_fields.name: summary
sub_fields.instructions: Aim for 100-125 characters so that all summaries are about the same length.
